summary: The Hanson Brothers are back, and who better to whip a ragtag youth team into shape for the upcoming championships than the most unpredictable trio ever to strap on skates?
cast: Greyston Holt|Jeff Carlson|Steve Carlson|David Hanson|Lynda Boyd|Ryan McDonell|Mark Messier|Doug Gilmour|Leslie Nielsen|Tyler Johnston|Scott Patey|Hunter Elliott|Samuel Patrick Chu|Emma Lahana|Adrian Hough|Sara Canning|Eric Keenleyside|Brett Kelly|Darien Provost|Daniel Bristol|Nico Ghisi|Willy Lavendel|Trevor Chong|Adam Klein|Stephanie Belding|Peter Benson|Dustin Eriksen|Marc Gaudet|Dave Cameron|Ryan Grantham|Kirk McMeekan|Eduardo Noda
title: Slap Shot 3: The Junior League
